title: Mrs Walton's Christmas cake
ingredients: ['225g (1/2lb) butter', '50g (2oz) lard', '175g (6oz) soft brown sugar', 'Pinch salt', '250g (9oz ) self raising flour', '4 eggs, beaten', '450g (1lb) currants', '115g (1/4lb) sultanas', '115g (1/4lb) candied peel', '50 to 100g (2 to 4oz) glace cherries', '1/4 teaspoon mace', '1/4 teaspoon nutmeg']
